title: One in critical following shooting on south east side
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
INDIANAPOLIS (WISH) — An 18-year-old male, Kodi Prunner, is in critical condition from a gunshot wound to the head early Saturday morning.
Authorities said the incident occurred just after 2:00 a.m. near Little Leaf Place at Little Leaf Court.
Officers who responded to the scene found the victim lying in the road before transporting him to Sidney & Lois Eskenazi Hospital.
A suspect, 49-year-old William Zweck, is now in custody. Police said he was apprehended near the scene.
Possible motives for the shooting have not been released.
Stay with WISH-TV for updates.
